title: 167: Sex Work with Selena the Stripper
itunes:title: 167: Sex Work with Selena the Stripper
description:
The Broads are joined by Selena the Stripper aka @prettyboygirl (they/them or Fae/Faer) for a chat all about their experience in sex work including sugaring, phone sex, stripping, etc. They chat about how Selena began their work, first days on the job, clients, kink, laws, appropriation of strippers by pop icons, elevating sex workers voices, and much more! 
SELENA THE STRIPPER:
Follow @prettyboygirl
Podcast “Heaux In The Kneaux”: https://open.spotify.com/show/3lzHCfGWYUo3Yb8BRYAEYR?si=B0_oYkJ7RRuxJ0P8VSBkmQ
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/therealprettyboygirl
ORGANIZATIONS TO FOLLOW: 
SOLIDERS OF POLE: https://soldiersofpole.com/
Follow at: https://www.instagram.com/soldiers_of_pole_/
PDX STRIPPER STRIKE: https://www.haymarketpole.com/ 
 
Follow at:  @pdxstripperstrike
THE BLACK SEX WORKER COLLECTIVE: https://www.blacksexworkercollective.org
Fundraiser: https://www.blacksexworkercollective.org/events
THANK YOU TO OUR SPONSORS: 
***DHM DETOX: Get 20% off your order at DHMdetox.com with promo code "CHATTY” at checkout!
***OSHOT BY OMAX: Get 20 % off O-Shot plus free shipping at OSHOTCBD.com today and enter code CHATTY
***DAILY HARVEST: Go to dailyharvest.com and enter promo code CHATTY to get $25 off your first box!
***STAMPS.COM:Get a 4-week trial PLUS free postage AND a digital scale without any long-term commitment at Stamps.com, click on the Microphone at the TOP of the homepage and type in CHATTY
 
***ISSUU: Go to ISSUU.INFO/​CHATTY ​to sign up for your FREE account

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
